definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: These fruit knives are very good for stripping apple skins off.
sentences.chinese: 这种水果刀削苹果皮很好用。

sentences.english: Would you please pass that fruit knife over so I can have a look at it?
sentences.chinese: 请把那个水果刀拿给我看一下，行吗？

sentences.english: So she grabbed a fruit knife on the table and stabbed Chen.
sentences.chinese: 王莉颤抖着抓起桌子上的水果刀向陈勇军刺去。

sentences.english: He was relieved to see that his wife had found a clean paring knife.
sentences.chinese: 当他看到妻子给他找到了一把干净的水果刀才放了心。

sentences.english: It's alleged the woman used a fruit knife to fatally stab Deng Guida and injure Huang.
sentences.chinese: 据称该女子用水果刀刺杀邓贵大致死，并刺伤黄。

sentences.english: She drew a fruit knife out of her bag and lashed out.
sentences.chinese: 她提请水果刀从她的袋子和抨击。

sentences.english: If you don’t have a corer, push a paring knife through the apple and cut around the core.
sentences.chinese: 如果你没有去心器，可用水果刀穿过苹果沿核切开。

definition: to wound with a blade or hatchet/to slash/to gash
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
